raw_body: STAVE – JOHN – Beloved husband of Kumari,​ everloving father of late Jakola,​ Angelo,​ Nicola (Australia),​ Jessica,​ Jacqulina,​ Camy and Shervon,​ father-in-law of Stella,​ Chamika (Australia),​ Suresh and Rohan,​ grandfather of Dorian,​ Ethan (Australia),​ Hayden,​ Nathan (Australia),​ Brandan (Australia),​ Sophia,​ Callan and Calliope,​ son of the late Tony and Gertrude Stave,​ brother of Arlene (Australia),​ Susan (Australia),​ Felician,​ Ingrid and Gereard,​ brother-in-law of Keiran (Australia),​ Travis (Australia),​ late Luckshmi. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Saturday the 26th August for Burial at General Cemetery Borella. (Roman Catholic Section).053221
